mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_AUTHOR, POST_DEL_YN, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM TD_POST WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} AND POST_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TD_POST ( POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_AUTHOR, POST_DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postAuthor}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TD_POST SET POST_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} AND POST_DEL_YN = 'N'
